channel.title: 639 Server I just want to get a friend on it with me to test it out
channel.description:
How can i do this ? ( Get a friend on the server with me so he can help me test things) Can I even do that ? like just host from my computer .. Telling him my ip isnt a problem so..
Do I have to portfoward for this ?
